Subang Jaya, 47600 Subang Jaya, Selangor Darul Ehsan.

Tel: 603 - 7890 3535 Fax: 603 - 7890 3536

Service Tax No : B16-1808-3104-2876

Payment Method :

1. All cheques should be crossed and made payable to LINE CLEAR EXPRES SDN BHD

2. Overdue Interest at the rate of 1.5% per month will be charged on all overdue amounts.

3. Line Clear Express Bank Details: Malayan Banking Berhad (Account No.: 5127 5451 2862)

4. Please email bank-in slip / credit advice to bcc@lineclearexpress.com

5. Online payment (KiplePay) is now available for our customers! It is safe, hassle-free and you can pay invoice

    anytime. Just access from OMS system and pay your invoice.

E-INVOICE

Thank you for choosing LINE CLEAR EXPRESS
